commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yes, yes, yes! I'm going to have the most beautiful skin in the universe!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I knew it! It's Nico!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Huh? What? Chika?! Why are you here?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* I was watching a school idol event 'til just now! I was getting thirsty, so I came over here to buy a drink.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Then I heard a loud, "HERE GOES," and was like, huh! That sounds like Nico! So I came on over to check.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: And it turned out that your intuition was right. *Giggle* I guess the galaxy's number one idol does have a rather distinctive voice, doesn't she?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Ugh... That's not a compliment and I know it.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: So hey, what was all the commotion about anyway? Sounded like something good!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: She just won the grand prize in the lottery. Right?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: That's right! Get a load of this! This right here is a shining testament of my victory! A ticket to a ryokan inn with hot springs!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The grand prize?! Wow, and this is for a super famous inn, too! Holy moly, you are one lucky duck!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Heh-heh-heh... Of course I am!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Man, lotteries are really somethin'... Come to think of it, I think I got a ticket from shopping earlier, too. It's just one, though.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: You did? Then why don't you give it a whirl? You might get the grand prize!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Uh, I already won the grand prize, you know.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Yes, but there's one more. It says so on the list of prizes. See? "Grand Prize - Tickets to Stay at a Ryokan Inn with Hot Springs - Two Available."

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: O-Oh. So it does.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle* I wonder if I'll get the grand prize. That industrial kitchen soap looks good too, though. It's the same kind as the one I have at home.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: What's the point of trying if you're not aiming for the top?! Either way, if you win, you'd better cough it up.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What? Nuh-uh.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Nico-chi, don't be mean. I'll give you my spiritual power, Chika-chi. Hold my hand.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Okay! I just know I'll get somethin' good if you're here, Nozomi! All right, here goes!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's out! And it's... Yellow! Wowie! I got third prize!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: No! That's gold! That's the grand prize!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: What?! Y-You're right! Whoooa! I did it! I got first prize!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Nico just won it too, so that makes two grand prize winners in a row, right?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I can't believe this is happening. Spiritual power is amazing!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: A little TOO amazing, if you ask me.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Lucky you, Chika-chi. So who will you be taking with you? Your family?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hmm... Well, if it's okay with you, I'd like to go with all of you! We can invite everyone in μ's and Aqours. Oh, and the Nijigasaki girls too!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Huh? You want us to come with you? That's so nice of you! What do you say, Nico-chi?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: All of us, huh? Yeah, that might be fun. Let's do it.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Great! I'll run it by everyone in Aqours later!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'll let the rest of μ's know, too. You're coming, right Nozomi?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Yup! I can hardly wait.
